round_best: Develop a one-pass streaming algorithm that leverages a randomized sketching technique combined with adaptive thresholding to selectively retain influential columns of the matrix A. The algorithm would utilize a dynamic quantile estimation scheme to adjust the importance threshold in real-time, based on the evolving norms of arriving columns. This approach minimizes memory usage by only storing columns that significantly alter the current solution landscape, potentially improving both the computational efficiency and accuracy of the solution in underdetermined ℓp regression problems.
